document.full_text: shooting rampage suspect jared loughner, who was found mentally incompetent to stand trial on charges he killed six people and wounded arizona congresswoman gabrielle giffords, was returned to a hospital in missouri on friday, authorities said.
document.title: accused tucson shooter returned to missouri hospital
lines_and_colors: shooting rampage suspect jared loughner, who was found mentally incompetent to stand trial on charges he killed six people and wounded arizona congresswoman gabrielle giffords, was returned to a hospital in missouri on friday, authorities said.
